proposal.name: WEBGL_video_texture

contributors.contributor: Members of the WebGL working group

mirrors.name: OES_EGL_image_external
mirrors.addendum: Defines a new texture target TEXTURE_VIDEO_IMAGE_WEBGL and a new sampler type SAMPLER_VIDEO_IMAGE_WEBGL
Provides a mechanism for binding HTMLVideoElement stream to video texture targets.
Provides time of frame, texture width and height of HTMLVideoElement's texture binding.

features.feature: Add support for WEBGL_video_texture binding of HTMLVideoElement.
Textures bound to TEXTURE_VIDEO_IMAGE_WEBGL only accept LINEAR and NEAREST for TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER and TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER.
Textures bound to TEXTURE_VIDEO_IMAGE_WEBGL only accept CLAMP_TO_EDGE for TEXTURE_WRAP_S and TEXTURE_WRAP_T.
The maximum mipmap level of textures that bind to TEXTURE_VIDEO_IMAGE_WEBGL is 1.
shareVideoImageWEBGL will lock video frame and reject another video source until call releaseVideoImageWEBGL.

If the application does not call releaseVideoImageWEBGL, then all of the WebGLTextures with which video frames were shared will be implicitly released when the current JavaScript code returns control to the user agent.

samplecode.p: This a fragment shader that samples a video texture.
This shows application that renders video using proposed extension.
Application renders each video frames into WebGL canvas based on game-loop pattern.

revision.change: Change EGLImageTargetTexture2DOES to be called at every WebGL rendering cycle.
Change EGLImageTargetTexture2DOES to return VideoFrameInfo as a currently mapped frame.
Change Extension name to WEBGL_video_texture for abstracion of OES_EGL_image_external extension.
Define new sampler and texture type, TEXTURE_VIDEO_IMAGE and SAMPLER_VIDEO_IMAGE.
Add WEBGL suffix for extension enums.
Change function name VideoElementTargetVideoTexture to shareVideoImageWEBGL
Declare possible side effect of TEXTURE_VIDEO_IMAGE_WEBGL.
Add releaseVideoImageWEBGL and implicit release rules
Define textureVideoWEBGL, rather than using texture2D, in ESSL 1.00 shaders.
Allocate enums for TEXTURE_VIDEO_IMAGE_WEBGL and SAMPLER_VIDEO_IMAGE_WEBGL out of WebGL's current assigned enum block in the OpenGL extension registry.
Change return type of releaseVideoImageWEBGL from bool to void.
